sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-row class="header__navbar">
    <v-app-bar-nav-icon></v-app-bar-nav-icon>
    <v-toolbar-title :style="`${this.fontStyle}`">
      Heavify
    </v-toolbar-title>
    <v-spacer></v-spacer>
    <v-btn icon>
      <v-icon>mdi-magnify</v-icon>
    </v-btn>
    <v-btn icon>
      <v-icon>mdi-heart</v-icon>
    </v-btn>
    <v-btn icon>
      <v-icon>mdi-dots-vertical</v-icon>
    </v-btn>
  </v-row>
</template>

<script>

export default {
  name: "TheHeadingNavbar",
  computed: {
    fontStyle() {
      switch (this.$vuetify.breakpoint.name) {
        case 'xs': return "font-size:10px;position:relative;top:-8px !important;"
        case 'sm': return "font-size:22px;position:relative;top:-4px !important;"
        case 'md': return "font-size:28px;position:relative;"
        case 'lg': return "9px;"
        case 'xl': return "10px;"
      }
    },
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
  .v-toolbar__title {
    font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif !important;
    font-weight: bold;
  }

  .header__navbar {
    position: relative;
    padding-top: 1vh;
  }
</style>
